H0.text: Spider, Idiot’s Delight, Canfield, Pyramid and Clock are all forms of what card game. Solitaire

H1.text: Spider, Idiot’s Delight, Canfield, Pyramid and Clock are all forms of what card game. Rummy

H2.text: Spider, Idiot’s Delight, Canfield, Pyramid and Clock are all forms of what card game. Poker

H3.text: Spider, Idiot’s Delight, Canfield, Pyramid and Clock are all forms of what card game. Patience

A4.text: Klondike (solitaire), a card game, also known as solitaire in North America

A5.text: Solitaire (game), American name for a genre of single-player card games known as 'patience' elsewhere
